1.content: How big does this family start out?
1.title: A family of giants

11.content:
Jess is in the kitchen making breakfast. Wearing a white button up blouse over her d-cup breasts and a bark blue skirt that reaches her ankles. Her size sixteen and a half flats (13") exposed. Her curly, red hair falling just below her waist. Her husband, Brian comes in, planting a kiss on her lips as he smiles.

         The sound of bare feet can be heard running down the steps as both Emma and Abby head for the dining room. Both take after their mother, long red hair that curls, Emma's reaching the floor while Abbey's is only at her chest. Their feet are large, like their mother's, both wearing a size ten and a half, women's and girl's sizes respectively.
11.title: Normal Sized Family

113.content:
Emma is sitting art the table, enjoying her breakfast, french toast being her favorite. Wearing her white shirt that has a cat chasing a yarn ball on it, and her navy blue pants. Swinging her legs as her feet are moving back and forth, her nails painted a bright red.

         Emma has a strange fascination with feet. She can't explain it, nor does she understand why. She always found herself playing with her own feet in her freebtime, or her mother's when she was permitted.

         "Thank you for breakfast Mommy," Emma says, right before taking another bite. She hiccups, from eating a bit too fast.

         "You're welcome," Jess responds, smiling.

         As Emma is still eating, her entire body starts to ache. Its not painful, just uncomfortable. Her clothes are shifting on her entire body. The bottoms of her pants are slowly rising, exposing her ankles as her feet get closer to the floor.

         What kind of growth is Emma experiencing?
113.title: The Big Sister

choices: She did not grow, for now.
1131.content:
Choice: A slow continuous growth

Emma completed her meal and placed her plate at the sink. She walked towards her room and closed the door. She quickly went to her closet and opened the door. Inside the closet was a full body mirror.

She took a good look at her reflection. Emma saw that her clothes looked a bit smaller on her body. ‘Am I really growing?’ Emma asked herself. ‘Well, there is only one way to find out.’

She immediately took a measuring tape to measure her height. She was 52 inches tall! She has grown by 3 inches. She couldn’t believe but she has really grown. She lied down on her bed, excited about the prospects of growing.

A text message appeared on her phone and it was from her friend, Sparky. “Do you want to come over my place today?” She thought for a while and replied “Sure, I will there in 10 minutes.”

Emma glance at her clothes, her pants was rising up her legs and her shirt was rising from their tucked in positions. Emma thought ‘sure I my clothes are a bit tight but it still looked decent enough’. So she decided to go with her current clothes and walked down the stairs and out the house. As she walked towards her friend’s house, ___.
1131.title: Humble start

choices: She grows whenever she has milk
114.content:
Abby is sitting at the table, in her booster seat, enjoying breakfastbwith her family. The three year old girl enjoying her scrambled eggs and toast along with her glass of milk. Wearing a dark blue t-shirt with a sleeping cat on the front, and black pants that reach her ankles, she is contently swinging her bare feet back and forth.

         As Abby is drinking her milk, she starts to feel odd, almost as if she is dizzy. She shakes her head, tryingbto dispel this sensation but it persists. She can feel her clothes shifting on her body, unaware of how her perspective is slowly moving upward.

         Author's notes: With choice 3, Abby will not just grow from milk, but anything that contains it. For example, because Jess put milk in the eggs, Abby will grow from eating them.
114.title: The Little Girl

choices: 3 inches a minute this isn’t good
1141.content:
— Flashback last night —-
Abby had done something to annoy Emma.
Abby did something Emma had to clean.
Later Emma saw a shooting star.



“It worked in the movies so it’s worth a shot. First star I see tonight I wish I may I wish I might have the wish I wish tonight. I wish Abby was bigger, big enough to clean up her messes no matter how big”



Soon after Emma went to bed.
The star glowed then changed course.
Unknown to the family.
The star headed towards Abby’s bedroom.
As it approached her window it became see through.
It passed through her window like a ghost.


The star then struck Abby without waking her up.
It stopped sitting on her chest then the start shaped object merged with her.


- Back to the present -

Emma was unaware of the what she had done to her 3 year old sister.

As Abby is drinking her milk, she starts to feel odd, almost as if she is dizzy. She shakes her head, trying to dispel this sensation but it persists. She can feel her clothes shifting on her body, unaware of how her perspective is slowly moving upward.

Abby is growing at a rate of
1141.title: Slow Continuous Growth

choices: Abby is growing at a rate or .25% a minute (16.2% an hour)
Abby is growing at a rate of 1% a minute (81.8% an hour)

She gets distracted by her toys (Abby has a playful, cyrioys nature)
114131.content:
Abby can't shake the dizzy feeling that she has as she continues to eat her breakfast.Her body is slowly growing, imperceptible to the human eye at the moment. By the time she finishes eating, she has already grown by a full inch and a half. "All gone!" Abby sats with a smile on her face as her mother picks up her empty plate.

"Okay Abby," Jess says with a loving smile on her face, "Go upstairs and get dressed now, okay?Mommy has errands to run." As the three year old girl gets up from the table, her big feet hitting the floor, Jess continues, " If you are good, we will go to the toy store today. "

Abby runs up th steps excitedly, tripping over her own feet once as she does so.She gets up quickly, as she is used to it as trips over her own feet alot. As she enters her room, she sees the clothes her mother has left out for her. A pair of black slacks and a light blue shirt that has a skirt-like bottom to it. As she walks over to her clothes, she starts to eye her toy chest over in the corner. She stares at it for a moment as she sees her favorite doll.

Abby: 2'9"
Time: 8:10 - 8:35
Feet: 7.33" ( 4.5:1 ratio)
Shoes 7.378" ( girls 10.5)
114131.title: A Relatively Slow Beginning fir the Little Girl

1141312.content:
Abby moves closer to her toy chest, her hands moving closer to her doll. She picks it up, smiling as she has her favorite doll in her hands. "Meg," she sat smiling before ahe digs through her toy chest even more, tossing random toys out as she is looking for something that catches her interest. After a moment, she drops her doll as she starts to really dig through her toy chest.

Abby's pants no longer reach her ankles as she is about three full inches taller now. Her shirt starting to cling to her childish frame. Her clothes are still shifting on on her growing body, thevtoddler unaware of the changes her body is going through.

"Abby," Emma says as she enters her sister's room fully dressed. Wearing a pair of jeans and a bright yellow shirt, she looks at her young sister with disgust as she sees that Abby is playing instead. "" Abby, you are supposed to be getting dressed, " Emma says with an attitude.

Emma takes her fidgety sister and proceeds to dress her. Abby laughing as she is being playful, often shoving her feet in her sisters face, which cases Emma to gag from the smell. As fter gettingbher obnoxious sister dressed, she looks at her, seeing howvher clothes don't fit her quite right.


Abby: 3' 0.925"
Time: 8:55
Feet: 8.206"( 4.5:1 ratio)
Shoes 7.378" ( girls 10.5)

choices: Emma sees her sister's growth as exactly what she wished for
Emna worries, paranoid that her wish may have been twisted..
11413121.content:
Emma is staring at her sister, who is constantly trying to shove her feet in Emma's face, finding her sister's reaction to the smell quite amusing.

         "Abby, please," Emma says sounding a bit annoyed as she holds her sister's ankles. Emma giggles as she wiggles her short toes.

         Emma is eyeing her sister, seeing that she is about half an inch taller than shewas five minutes ago, not to mention how she is a bit over three feet tall now. Her mind wanders back to last night, when she saw that shooting star. "I wish Abby was bigger, big enough to clean up her messes no matter how big," she says to herself in a low voice. She loojjs back up atbher sister, whimis fidgeting a bit as she tries to free her feet. Emma thinks for a moment, about how her sister is growing.

1232.content: Hi! My name's Emma. I'm 8 and I like to read, play with dolls, and watch movies. I'm in the third grade, and I have lots of friends. My mommy and daddy are the best, and I even have a little sis, Abby. So my life is pretty cool. Tomorrow is my last day of summer, and I can't wait to spend it with my friends playing till the sun goes down. I leaped into my bed and went to sleep, excited for the next day.

154.content: What's their attitude towards people?
154.title: Good or bad?

1542.content:
Brian Paxton and Jess Oppens had become all-powerful ten years ago, in their late teens. They were both macrophiles, and to mankind's shock soon they were having city-sized sex. They weren't really cruel, but the world was a playground for their fantasies and it had been destroyed countless times. Anyway they always fixed back whatever was destroyed or killed and in compensation they reversed catastrophes and made the planet much more fertile. Worldwide militaries joined forces to stop them for half a year but it was no use, they were invulnerable and no kind of weapon could scratch or even annoy them even if they were normal-sized, so the world had to get used to them.

The story starts with:
1542.title: Unstoppable giants

choices: Emma and Abby are normal size... for now.
15421.content:
With the amount of sex the young couple was having, it was inevitable that Jess would get pregnant. And, indeed, she did; in fact, Jess and Brian would boast that Emma, their oldest daughter, was conceived on a sexual rampage that left their bodies covering all of Eurasia about eight years ago.

When Emma was five, her parents had given her a little sister: Abby, who had been conceived when her parents had fucked on the moon, big enough to be seen from Earth. The nations of the world had been alarmed bring under the thumb of even more giants, but the titanic couple had seemed to be content with having just two children.

For now, at least.

Right now, the two older giants were relaxing. Brian stood at 6800 feet tall, and Jess, his love, at 6500. Their superhumanly perfect bodies were laid across the landscape, using a mountain range to prop up their torsos. Jess muzzled Brian's neck, and the giant chuckled, kissing her.

They were naked; either could make clothes in their size, easily, but neither of them has any intention of doing so, and nobody could make them.

A mental reminder crossed between them; it was time to see to their girls.
15421.title: Brian and Jess

info.brief_description: A family grows in different ways then number.
info.description: The family has four members Brian (dad, 28), Jess (mom, 29), Emma (8), Abby (3). It is a normal day until they start growing! It is up to you to decide the rate of growth and how big they will become. Their heights are 68, 65, 49, 33 respectively in inches so make their sizes proportional and right.
